headline: Tyson Foods Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: SPRINGDALE, Ark., Feb. 04, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of Tyson Foods (NYSE: TSN), at a meeting on February 4, 2026, declared a quarterly dividend of $0.51 per share on Class A common stock and $0.459 per share on Class B common stock, payable on June 15, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 1, 2026. About Tyson Foods, Inc. Tyson Foods, Inc. (NYSE: TSN) is a world-class food company and recognized leader in protein. Founded in 1935 by John W. Tyson
